lyrics.text: Lesson 137. A pleasant dream. Listen to the tape, then answer this question. What would
lyrics.translation: 第137课。一个愉快的梦。听录音，然后回答这个问题。会是什么

lyrics.text: Julie like to do if she had the money? Are you doing the football, Pools Bryan? Yes,
lyrics.translation: 如果朱莉有钱，她会喜欢做什么？你在做足球博彩吗，布莱恩？是的。

lyrics.text: I've nearly finished, Julie. I'm sure we'll win something this week. You always say that,
lyrics.translation: 我快完成了，朱莉。我相信我们这周会赢得一些东西。你总是这么说，

lyrics.text: but we never win anything. What will you do if you win a lot of money? If I win a lot of money,
lyrics.translation: 但我们从没赢过什么。如果你赢了很多钱，你会做什么？如果我赢了很多钱，

lyrics.text: I'll buy you a mink coat. I don't want a mink coat. I want to see the world. All right,
lyrics.translation: 我会买给你一件貂皮大衣。我不想要貂皮大衣。我想去看看这个世界。好吧，

lyrics.text: if we win a lot of money, we'll travel around the world and we'll stay at the best hotels.
lyrics.translation: 如果我们赢得了很多钱，我们将环游世界并住在最好的酒店。

lyrics.text: Then we'll return home and buy a big house in the country. We'll have a beautiful garden and...
lyrics.translation: 然后我们将回家，在乡下买一栋大房子。我们将拥有一个美丽的花园，并且...

lyrics.text: But if we spend all that money, we'll be poor again. What will we do then? If we spend all
lyrics.translation: of our money, we'll be poor again. What will we do then? If we spend all

lyrics.text: that money, we'll try and win the football, Pools again. It's a pleasant dream,
lyrics.translation: 那些钱，我们会尝试再次赢得足球博彩。这是一个愉快的梦想。
但是一切都取决于是否。
